I feel like the lady is not really Kuki and she is originally a stalker who thought it was a good opportunity to take the place of someone acquainted to Takuya. In addition nobody really saw her face before so she only had to cover her face. As we can see they described Kuki like a stick which is quite different to what we saw, but it could be said that it was just growth spurt. Then let's include that Kuki died in a freak accident, last month and the fact that it wasn't specified when he started getting those photos, it makes sense that the sending of photos have been going on for quite a while even before the accident. What's more is that he didn't suspect the woman to be Kuki, despite the similar body figure, since he has a reason to believe Kuki won't do that, meaning Kuki isn't like that. So my only conclusion to this, is that the Kuki right now is an imposter and she killed the original.

That was unexpected

1.Takuya is an average dude
2.He's been receiving bizarre photos of a voluptuously stalker to his phone making him concerned for his well being.
3.He's reunited with and subsequently has to take care of an old female classmate who similarly freaks him out.
4.He drops her off at a love hotel but discovers she's his stalker.
5.However he quickly learns that she's a huge slut willing to put out for him.
6.He happily accepts her feelings the cost of which is his ability to see the giant red flags surrounding her.
7.After that night Takuya begins dating his stalker. Himself physically drained, but his partner looking better than ever.
8.Although he's unaware, Takuya's life is forever changed as the girl he's now begun dating is revealed to be a ghost, who may or may not be eating his life force through sex.

Fun Fact: Japanese love hotels are cheaper than regular hotels, so if you've wondered what's with that trope in anime & hentai, well, now you know. and knowing is half the battle.

Alternatively, the ghost reference in the title could be a red herring, and the girl is actually an obsessive stalker who used Kuki's death as a chance to impersonate her and get close to the MC (foreshadowed by her hiding her face and having a drastically different body type). However, I do think she's supposed to actually be Kuki's ghost, and her second wish involves binding the MC to her forever, since something ominous is going on with his appearance at the end. Either he isn't sleeping because he's having so much sex, or they're going to the shadow realm together. On another note, I did not expect hentai to ever reference John Wayne Gacy.
